languages.text: "Думаю, подобным мне самое место в тенях, шерин. Я знаю, как ведет дела в Просторе Миссия Касбаллики. И как отчаянно ей нужны талантливые посредники, чтобы сотрудничать с представителями власти... Как удачно, что Джай Хейдари обладает Меркатум Табула Официале и является торговым представителем Империума". {n}Хладная торговка довольно ухмыляется и подмигивает.{/n}

"I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Думаю, подобным мне самое место в тенях, шерин. Я знаю, как ведет дела в Просторе Миссия Касбаллики. И как отчаянно ей нужны талантливые посредники, чтобы сотрудничать с представителями власти... Как удачно, что Джай Хейдари обладает Меркатум Табула Официале и является торговым представителем Империума". {n}Хладная торговка довольно ухмыляется и подмигивает.{/n}

How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

languages.text: 「あたしみたいな奴は、影に潜んでおくのがお似合いなのよ、シャリーン。あたしはカスバリカ聖務団がエクスパンスでどんな活動をしてるか知っているわ。それに、有能な人材をどれだけ必要としてるのかも…ジェイ・ヘイダリがメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを所有し、帝国の貿易代表になれたら最高じゃない？」{n}闇商人は満足げな笑みを浮かべてウィンクをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたしみたいな奴は、影に潜んでおくのがお似合いなのよ、シャリーン。あたしはカスバリカ聖務団がエクスパンスでどんな活動をしてるか知っているわ。それに、有能な人材をどれだけ必要としてるのかも…ジェイ・ヘイダリがメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを所有し、帝国の貿易代表になれたら最高じゃない？」{n}闇商人は満足げな笑みを浮かべてウィンクをした。{/n}

languages.text: “我想，我这样的人还是最适合藏身于暗影之中，亲爱的。我知道卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团是如何在科罗努斯扩区运作的。我知道他们多么迫切地渴求一位长袖善舞的中间人与当局合作……他们真是太走运了，这位婕伊·海达利不仅拥有帝国官方行商执照，更是帝国派来的贸易代表。”{n}婕伊眨眨眼，露出洋洋自得的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我想，我这样的人还是最适合藏身于暗影之中，亲爱的。我知道卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团是如何在科罗努斯扩区运作的。我知道他们多么迫切地渴求一位长袖善舞的中间人与当局合作……他们真是太走运了，这位婕伊·海达利不仅拥有帝国官方行商执照，更是帝国派来的贸易代表。”{n}婕伊眨眨眼，露出洋洋自得的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich glaube, Leute wie ich sind in den Schatten am besten aufgehoben, Shereen. Ich weiß, wie die Kasballica-Mission in der Ausdehnung operiert. Und wie dringend sie auf talentierte Mittelsleute angewiesen ist, um mit den Machthabenden zusammenarbeiten zu können ... Welch ein Glück daher, dass Jae Heydari die Mercatum Tabula Officiale besitzt und Handelsvertreterin des Imperiums ist." {n}Die Kalthändlerin grinst dich selbstzufrieden an und zwinkert dir zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, Leute wie ich sind in den Schatten am besten aufgehoben, Shereen. Ich weiß, wie die Kasballica-Mission in der Ausdehnung operiert. Und wie dringend sie auf talentierte Mittelsleute angewiesen ist, um mit den Machthabenden zusammenarbeiten zu können ... Welch ein Glück daher, dass Jae Heydari die Mercatum Tabula Officiale besitzt und Handelsvertreterin des Imperiums ist." {n}Die Kalthändlerin grinst dich selbstzufrieden an und zwinkert dir zu.{/n}

languages.text: «Creo que mi lugar está en las sombras, shereen. Sé cómo actúa la Misión Kasballica en la Extensión. Y lo desesperada que está por tener intermediarios competentes para tratar con los poderes fácticos... Por suerte, Jae Heydari posee una Mercatum Tabula Officiale y es representante comercial del Imperium». {n}La comerciante fría te sonríe, satisfecha, y guiña un ojo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Creo que mi lugar está en las sombras, shereen. Sé cómo actúa la Misión Kasballica en la Extensión. Y lo desesperada que está por tener intermediarios competentes para tratar con los poderes fácticos... Por suerte, Jae Heydari posee una Mercatum Tabula Officiale y es representante comercial del Imperium». {n}La comerciante fría te sonríe, satisfecha, y guiña un ojo.{/n}

languages.text: « Les gens comme moi ont tout intérêt à rester dans l'ombre, shereen. Je connais les méthodes que la Mission de la Kasballica emploie dans les Étendues, et je sais qu'elle a désespérément besoin d'intermédiaires habiles pour collaborer avec les pouvoirs en place... Une chance, alors, que Jae Heydari possède la Mercatum Tabula Officiale et soit une représentante commerciale de l'Imperium, » {n}dit-il en vous lançant un clin d'œil avec un sourire satisfait.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les gens comme moi ont tout intérêt à rester dans l'ombre, shereen. Je connais les méthodes que la Mission de la Kasballica emploie dans les étendues, et je sais qu'elle a désespérément besoin d'intermédiaires habiles pour collaborer avec les pouvoirs en place... Une chance, alors, que Jae Heydari possède la Mercatum Tabula Officiale et soit une représentante commerciale de l'Imperium, » {n}dit-il en vous lançant un clin d'œil avec un sourire satisfait.{/n}

languages.text: "Benim gibi insanlara en uygun olan yerin gölgeler olduğu kanısındayım şirinim. Kasballica Misyonu'nun Enginlik'te ne şekilde faaliyet gösterdiğini biliyorum. Birlikte çalışacağı güçlü ve yetenekli aracılara ne kadar çok ihtiyaç duyduğunu da... Şanslılar ki Jae Heydari, elinde Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi bulunduruyor. Üstelik kendisi, İmparatorluk'un ticaret temsilcisi." {n}Soğuk Tacir, kendinden hoşnut bir şekilde sana gülümseyip göz kırpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think the best place for people like me is in the shadows, shereen. I know how the Kasballica Mission operates in the Expanse. And how desperately it needs talented intermediaries to work with the powers that be... How fortunate it is, then, that Jae Heydari possesses the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and is a trade representative of the Imperium." {n}The Cold Trader shoots you a self-satisfied smirk and winks.{/n}
